Class Coupon

java.lang.Object
com.greengrocer.models.Coupon
public class Coupon extends Object
Represents a discount coupon in the system. Coupons are created and managed by the owner.

    • setActive

      public void setActive(boolean active)
      Sets whether the coupon is active.
      Parameters:

      true if valid

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if order meets or exceeds minimum
